name: The Searcher Wild West Adventure
description: This is a Low-poly game in which you need to find all Masson Gold in the wild west. Also in the game there is a multiplayer-co-op (you can play together with a...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7\8\10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Recomended 1920x1080 resolution
